title: France panorama. [No. 73/06]
creator_contributor_role: Societe Nouvelle Pathe Cinema, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975
description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Cease-fire - the last meetings between American and Vietnamese representatives and the signing of the cease-fire. 2. Honors for Chandigahr - the Institut de la Vie honors the Indian builders of Chandigahr. 3. The NASA Medal goes to Professor Blamont - Professor Blamont and space. 4. In the news: City-planning - a new administrative building for the capital. Decoration - rocks and crystals. Baranoff and Mansouroff - Russian painters at the Museum of Modern Art.
